main event: On December 13, 1961, witnesses observed a pulsating, diamond-shaped object in the sky above Washington, D.C.
interesting points: The object was described as dark gray with a light at the center emitting a pulsating glow., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 to 5 minutes., Witnesses reported the object moved in an erratic pattern, including abrupt acceleration., A total of two persons confirmed witnessing the event., The object was observed at an estimated altitude of about 5000 feet.
sighted object: a diamond-shaped, dark gray object with a pulsating glow
location: Washington, D.C., District of Columbia, USA
witness description: At least two witnesses who reported seeing a bright object moving erratically in the sky.
